alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 11:30AM CST until February 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Village Creek Near Kountze Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Mermentau River Near Mermentau Sabine River Near Deweyville Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 3.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 4.1 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.5 Mon 5 am CST 4.0 4.1 4.1 &&
